events.message: The insured reported a car collision that occurred on the highway causing significant front-end damage.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and relevant keywords.
An agent was assigned to follow up on the claim and contact the customer for further details about the accident.
We have officially acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the customer help will be provided promptly.
Requested the insured to submit the accident report, vehicle photographs, and a police report for investigation.
The customer submitted the required police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimate from the garage.
The claims department has started investigating the circumstances around the collision and damage.
Investigation concluded confirming liability and verifying all submitted documents are consistent and valid.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover vehicle repair costs as per the estimate and policy terms.
The customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the timely communication.
The claim was approved by the claims manager following review of settlement terms and investigation results.
Payment covering the repair expenses was issued to the customerâ€™s designated bank account promptly.
The claim was officially closed after successful settlement payment and confirmation from the insured.
All claim files and records have been archived in compliance with company policies for future reference.
